text:
How much longer must we wait so that we can live a little again?
The #COVID19 #vaccine is our only lifeline & personally, I feel no closer to receiving mine than I was 12 months ago. That's the sad reality.

@Lyndao75 @5_niamh @Dearbhlac @V4VIreland
#Vaccines4Vulnerable #V4V https://t.co/Ae4VSPPnpp
